data.description:
ChatGPT
"Monkey Tags" is an electrifying fan game inspired by the adrenaline-fueled chaos of the popular VR multiplayer sensation, Gorilla Tag. In this thrilling virtual playground, players take on the role of agile primates swinging through towering urban jungles, soaring across skyscrapers, and zipping through bustling cityscapes.

With a vibrant and dynamic environment, Monkey Tags offers an exhilarating twist on the classic game of tag. As players navigate through the bustling metropolis, they must outmaneuver their rivals, using every ounce of their speed, agility, and cunning to avoid being tagged.

Featuring intuitive controls and immersive gameplay mechanics, Monkey Tags allows players to experience the rush of leaping from building to building, performing daring aerial stunts, and engaging in heart-pounding pursuits across the sprawling cityscape.

Whether you're a seasoned parkour enthusiast or a newcomer to the world of virtual reality, Monkey Tags promises endless hours of excitement, laughter, and heart-stopping moments as you compete against friends and foes in the ultimate game of primate prowess. Get ready to unleash your inner ape and swing into action in the electrifying world of Monkey Tags!
